lead_paragraph: TCM’s seven-part documentary series, “Moguls & Movie Stars,” traces the history of the American film industry through 1970, with an emphasis on its inventors and pioneering studio bosses.
snippet: TCM’s seven-part documentary series, “Moguls & Movie Stars,” traces the history of the American film industry through 1970, with an emphasis on its inventors and pioneering studio bosses.

headline.main: Portraits of Hollywood’s Founding Power Players
headline.print_headline: Portraits of Hollywood’s Founding Power Players
